resources.string: Allows the AvvA to interact with other apps through taps and gestures.
What do you want to do?
Explain the content of this screen.
Is the information on this screen correct?
Translate the content of this screen.
To use AvvA on any screen, grant these permissions
Grants access to the content of other apps.
Select "\"AvvA"\" as the default Voice Assistant App
Allows the app to display information over other apps while running in the background.
Select "\"AvvA Assistant"\" in "\"Downloaded Apps"\" to unlock responses with taps and gestures.

If the following prompt indicates a request to play, listen to, or reproduce a song, return a JSON in the format \'{findSound: "\"song name"\"}\'. Otherwise, respond normally by providing an informative and contextually relevant answer to the question. Prompt content: %1$s
